mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE(LT_NO, CRE_ID, TTL, INTRO, UP_CTGR, DOWN_CTGR, THUMB, PHT_1, PHT_2, PHT_3, OPEN_TERM, TLSN_TERM, PRC, KIT_NAME, KIT_INTRO, KIT_PRC, TAG_1, TAG_2, TAG_3, REQ_DATE, LT_ST_CODE, EXP_DATE, START_DATE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(LT_NO), 0)+1 FROM LECTURE), #{creId}, #{ttl}, #{intro}, #{upCtgr}, #{downCtgr}, #{thumb}, #{pht1}, #{pht2}, #{pht3}, #{openTerm}, #{tlsnTerm}, #{prc}, #{kitName}, #{kitIntro}, #{kitPrc}, #{tag1}, #{tag2}, #{tag3}, SYSDATE, #{ltStCode}, (SELECT ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{openTerm}) FROM DUAL), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CNAMELECTURE WHERE CRE_ID = #{creId} AND LT_ST_CODE IN ('L02','L07') ORDER BY LT_NO DESC

SELECT l.*, (select round(avg(star),1) from review r where (l.lt_no = r.lt_no) and rv_code ='RE01') as avgStar, (select count(*) from sugang s where l.lt_no = s.lt_no and s.tlsn_st_code in ('SU01', 'SU03')) as studentCount FROM CNAMELECTURE l WHERE l.CRE_ID = #{creId} AND l.LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' ORDER BY l.LT_NO DESC

SELECT l.*, (select round(avg(star),1) from review r where (l.lt_no = r.lt_no) and rv_code ='RE01') as avgStar, (select count(*) from sugang s where l.lt_no = s.lt_no and s.tlsn_st_code in ('SU01', 'SU03')) as studentCount FROM CNAMELECTURE l WHERE l.CRE_ID = #{creId} AND l.LT_ST_CODE = 'L03' ORDER BY l.LT_NO DESC

SELECT l.*, (select round(avg(star),1) from review r where (l.lt_no = r.lt_no) and rv_code ='RE01') as avgStar, (select count(*) from sugang s where l.lt_no = s.lt_no and s.tlsn_st_code in ('SU01', 'SU03')) as studentCount FROM CNAMELECTURE l WHERE l.CRE_ID = #{creId} AND l.LT_ST_CODE IN ('L04','L06') ORDER BY l.LT_NO DESC
SELECT R.* FROM CNAMELECTURE C JOIN REPORT R ON C.LT_NO = R.LT_NO WHERE RP_ST_CODE = 'RPS02' AND R.CTGR = 'RP02' AND R.LT_NO = #{ltNo}

mapper.update: UPDATE LECTURE LECTURE(LT_NO, CRE_ID, TTL, INTRO, UP_CTGR, DOWN_CTGR, THUMB, PHT_1, PHT_2, PHT_3, OPEN_TERM, TLSN_TERM, PRC, KIT_NAME, KIT_INTRO, KIT_PRC, TAG_1, TAG_2, TAG_3, REQ_DATE, LT_ST_CODE, EXP_DATE, START_DATE) SET((SELECT NVL(MAX(LT_NO), 0)+1 FROM LECTURE), #{creId}, #{ttl}, #{intro}, #{upCtgr}, #{downCtgr}, #{thumb}, #{pht1}, #{pht2}, #{pht3}, #{openTerm}, #{tlsnTerm}, #{prc}, #{kitName}, #{kitIntro}, #{kitPrc}, #{tag1}, #{tag2}, #{tag3}, SYSDATE, #{ltStCode}, (SELECT ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{openTerm}) FROM DUAL), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT L.*,NVL(P.SALES,0) SALES,NVL(P.CNT,0) CNT FROM (SELECT LT_NO,SUM(PAY) SALES,COUNT(*) CNT FROM SUGANG GROUP BY LT_NO) P RIGHT OUTER JOIN LECTURE L ON P.LT_NO = L.LT_NO WHERE L.CRE_ID = #{ID}
mapper.update: update lecture set open_term = #{openTerm}, req_date = sysdate, lt_st_code = 'L02', exp_date = (SELECT ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{openTerm}) FROM DUAL), start_date = sysdate where lt_no = #{ltNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT L.LT_NO,L.CRE_ID,C.name down_ctgr, C.up_name up_ctgr,U.NAME,L.TTL,L.REQ_DATE,L.LT_ST_CODE,COUNT(*) OVER() length FROM LECTURE L JOIN (select c.* ,c2.name up_name from ctgr c join ctgr c2 on c2.ctgr_id = c.up_ctgr) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID WHERE 1 =1
AND L.LT_ST_CODE IN ('L02','L07')
AND L.LT_ST_CODE = #{ltStCode}
and u.name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
and L.CRE_ID like '%'||#{creId}||'%'
and l.ttl like '%'||#{ttl}||'%'
AND c.up_name like '%'||#{upCtgr}||'%'
AND c.name like '%'||#{downCtgr}||'%'
and TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TRUNC(l.req_Date)
and TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(l.req_Date)
ORDER BY ${orderColumn} ${orderBy}
ORDER BY LT_NO DESC

SELECT L.*, C.name low_ctgr, C.up_name high_ctgr FROM LECTURE L JOIN (select c.* ,c2.name up_name from ctgr c join ctgr c2 on c2.ctgr_id = c.up_ctgr) C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID WHERE l.lt_no = #{ltNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture set LT_ST_CODE = 'L01' where LT_NO = #{ltNo}
UPDATE lecture set LT_ST_CODE = 'L07' where LT_NO = #{ltNo}
mapper.select: SELECT L.LT_NO,L.CRE_ID,FINDLTCODE(L.LT_ST_CODE) LT_ST_CODE_NAME,L.LT_ST_CODE,L.TTL,L.INTRO,RV.AVGSTAR,R.CNT,L.KIT_NAME,L.KIT_INTRO,L.KIT_PRC, C.NAME DOWN_CTGR, CU.NAME UP_CTGR,L.THUMB,L.OPEN_TERM,L.KIT_NAME,L.REQ_DATE,L.START_DATE,L.EXP_DATE,ADD_MONTHS(L.EXP_DATE,L.TLSN_TERM) END_DATE FROM LECTURE L LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LT_NO,COUNT(*) CNT FROM REPORT WHERE CTGR = 'RP02' AND RP_ST_CODE = 'RPS02' GROUP BY LT_NO) R ON L.LT_NO = R.LT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT LT_NO,TRUNC(AVG(STAR),1) AVGSTAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY LT_NO) RV ON L.LT_NO = RV.LT_NO JOIN CTGR C ON L.DOWN_CTGR = C.CTGR_ID JOIN CTGR CU ON L.UP_CTGR = CU.CTGR_ID WHERE L.LT_NO = #{ltNo}
